content.rendered: In this volume, we explore the subject of collecting. We converse with Pierre Yovanovitch and Daniel Buren, discuss curation with Hans Ulrich Obrist, and visit the home of Phillip Lim. We travel to South Tyrol for the Dolomites, Marfa for Donald Judd‘s architecture, and escape to Kyoto and Lake Como.

excerpt.rendered: In this volume, we explore the subject of collecting. We converse with Pierre Yovanovitch and Daniel Buren, discuss curation with Hans Ulrich Obrist, and visit the home of Phillip Lim. We travel to South Tyrol for the Dolomites, Marfa for Donald Judd‘s architecture, and escape to Kyoto and Lake Como.
